results.name: A Rose Petal In The Lavender Thorn Bush: Medieval Undoings
Frog and Toad An Interactive Story

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 1X+
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics chip (Nvidia/AMD)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any will do
  • VR Support: No
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 1X+
  • Processor: 4Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics chip (Nvidia/AMD)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any will do
  • VR Support: No
